name: Explain a concept
description: Explains the context or reason behind the primary subject or feature in the image.
example_questions: Why is [object name] in the image?
What are your reasoning behind those?
What is your reasoning behind this?
Why did you make such a decision?
What is the reason behind this?
Why did you make such prediction?

action_list.content: Generate the code using the tools provided to explain the concept of the image.
Execute the code to explain the concept of the image.
From the results, interpret the attributes that help identify the concept of the image.
